title: Traits and Features
content:
ctified Stalker

You have become an expert at moving through the wilderness. Difficult Terrain no longer slows you down.

Your agility lets you dodge out of the way of certain spells.

When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, it deals no damage if you succeed, and only half damage if you fail.

Monk Lvl 7 Rogue Lvl 7
